name: The Magic Snow Globe
description:
Welcome to a fairy tale Christmas.

Sit by the fire and drift off to sleep. That is...unless your wonky magic snow globe decides to transport you into a world of ice, snow and danger!

Get shrunk down and navigate an icy environment. The only way to return to your fireside is to collect ten magical snowmen and enter the portal home.

Good luck!

*****

Made for the Game Dev Unlocked Game Jam #5: Fairy Tales

December 17th - December 18th 2022

*****

Music by Nicholas Singer

http://www.nicholassinger.com/

*****

The game will be updated after the jam with many more environmental details and areas to explore, plus many cosmetic additions as well as numerous sound effects and particle effects too.
